pages.text: $(o)"随即, 在虚无之中, 萌发出一道思想。这是来自盲目痴愚之神的幽思, 或许这给予了祂不朽之身。这道思想具象化为了五条巨龙, 它们使祂陷入永恒的沉眠, 并将形式赋予了祂的梦境。"$()

pages.title: Dragons
pages.text: The symbols for these are created with $(item)Scales$() of the primal aspects in the $(l:glory/entry_rite_glorious)Glorious Rite$(). They are created by tossing $(marked)Prismarine Shards$() together with $(t:Air, Earth, Fire, Water, or Aether Essence)the matching essence$() and an $(l:alchemy/entry_gem)Arcane Gem$(). Then, a $(l:shaping/entry_hammer)Hammer of Heat$() must be used on these items on the ground.

All dragons can provide aspects to an altar, and will buff matching elemental souls and dragon souls.$(br)That means that, as example, a Symbol of the Fire Dragon will buff a Fire Soul. The soul will be buffed by applying a speed, strength, resistance, and magan regeneration buff. It should be noted that Aether Dragons will buff $(marked)Ancient Souls$().
